## kl wg connect

connect selected device wireguard

### Synopsis

connect wireguard
Examples:
  # connect the selected device
  kl wg connect

  # connect the selected device with verbose
  kl wg connect -v

	

```
kl wg connect [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --foreground   
  -h, --help         help for connect
  -v, --verbose      show verbose
```
